Come out before the game or at the end of halftime and make speeches, defy the league dress code and wear things during games that promote the cause, start foundations, run media ads, work with the local communities and police departments... the list is endless. But the way they are promoting their cause today is not working.... and will fail. Let me ask a question... Of all the ongoing conversation about the players' protests, how much of it has actually been about how to reduce the number of unjustified police shootings? 5%? 1%? Less than that? But it's not too late. If the players change their approach and take a different path to achieve their good cause, they will find we will be behind them 100%. But until the players wake up and realize that they've taken the wrong path with the Anthem and the Flag, they will continue to suffer, along with the league... They will fail. That's my opinion (and many, many others, by the way)
